hero.badgeText: We turn ideas into systems that drive measurable results
hero.title: Software That Accelerates Your Growth
hero.subtitle: We build enterprise solutions that reduce operational costs by up to 40% and boost your team's productivity. Technology that delivers measurable ROI.

customDevelopment.name: Strategic Development
customDevelopment.description: Custom enterprise systems that automate critical processes and eliminate operational bottlenecks. Average ROI of 300% in the first year.

rapidDeployment.name: Accelerated Go-to-Market
rapidDeployment.description: Production deployment 60% faster with our enterprise DevOps methodology. Reduce time-to-market and capture opportunities quicker.

systemIntegration.name: Intelligent Integration
systemIntegration.description: We unify your legacy and modern systems into a cohesive ecosystem. Eliminate data silos and gain complete business visibility.

performanceOptimization.name: Enterprise Performance
performanceOptimization.description: Optimizations that reduce latency by up to 80% and infrastructure costs by 50%. Applications that scale with your growth.

crossPlatformApps.name: Native Cross-Platform
crossPlatformApps.description: Apps that perform like natives across all platforms, reducing development costs by 60% without compromising quality.

textReveal.content: Stop losing revenue to inefficient processes. Every day your business operates with disconnected systems, manual workflows, and performance bottlenecks, you're hemorrhaging potential profits. While your competitors embrace enterprise automation, you're still fighting operational friction that could be eliminated tomorrow. The question isn't whether you can afford to modernize your technology—it's whether you can afford not to. Transform your business infrastructure today and unlock the exponential growth that's waiting on the other side of efficiency.

footer.tagline: Building the future with innovative technology

careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.subtitle: Join a passionate team dedicated to transforming businesses through technology. We offer a collaborative environment, challenging projects, and real opportunities for professional growth.

careers.positionsSubtitle: Explore our opportunities and find the ideal position for your professional growth

fullStackDeveloper.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
fullStackDeveloper.description: We're looking for an experienced full stack developer to lead the development of complex enterprise solutions. You'll work with modern technologies and have autonomy to propose architectural improvements.
requirements: 5+ years experience with React, Next.js and Node.js
Strong experience with TypeScript and relational databases
Knowledge of Docker, CI/CD and microservices architecture
Experience with automated testing and agile methodologies

devopsEngineer.title: DevOps Engineer
devopsEngineer.description: We're seeking a DevOps engineer to optimize our infrastructure and deployment processes. You'll be responsible for implementing automation and monitoring solutions in cloud environments.
requirements: Experience with AWS, Azure or Google Cloud Platform
Proficiency in Terraform, Kubernetes and Docker
Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and GitOps

productManager.title: Product Manager
productManager.description: We're looking for a strategic product manager to lead enterprise product development. You'll be responsible for defining roadmaps, working with stakeholders and ensuring value delivery.
requirements: 3+ years experience in B2B product management
Knowledge of agile methodologies and design thinking
Experience with data analysis and product metrics

careers.ctaSubtitle: Send your resume to our talent pool. We're always looking for exceptional professionals to join our team.

company.badgeText: Built for the AI-first, post-digital transformation era
company.title: The Software Platform Built for Tomorrow's Business Reality
company.subtitle: While others carry legacy thinking from the 2010s, we started in 2025 with a clean slate. Zero technical debt. Zero outdated assumptions. 100% focused on what enterprise software should be in the AI era.
company.storySubtitle: Fresh perspective, cutting-edge foundation, measurable results
company.storyContent: Founded in 2025 by battle-tested enterprise veterans who saw the industry's fundamental flaw: companies built on 2010s assumptions trying to solve 2025+ problems. While competitors struggle with legacy architectures and outdated methodologies, we built Liro from day one for the AI-driven, hyper-automated business landscape that defines success today.
company.storyHighlight: Result: Our clients achieve 40% faster implementation, 60% lower TCO, and 300% ROI because we're not fighting against yesterday's constraints.
company.valuesSubtitle: What happens when you build enterprise software with a clean slate in the AI era

resultsFirst.title: AI-Native ROI Acceleration
resultsFirst.description: Every solution leverages 2025's AI breakthrough capabilities for unprecedented automation and insight generation. Our clients see measurable ROI 3x faster than legacy providers because we're built for today's business velocity.

enterpriseScale.title: Post-Cloud Architecture
enterpriseScale.description: We started with 2025's infrastructure realities—edge computing, AI acceleration, quantum-ready security. No migration headaches, no technical debt, no legacy limitations holding back your growth.

technicalExcellence.title: 2025 Technology Stack
technicalExcellence.description: Latest AI models, next-gen security protocols, real-time automation frameworks. We don't retrofit old systems—we build with technologies that define competitive advantage today.

partnershipMindset.title: Future-Forward Partnership
partnershipMindset.description: While others help you catch up to 2020, we help you leapfrog to 2030. Strategic partnership means preparing your business for tomorrow's opportunities, not yesterday's problems.

company.teamSubtitle: Experienced leaders who've built and scaled enterprise solutions

ceo.name: Rafael Silva
ceo.bio: Former VP of Engineering at two unicorn startups. Led teams that delivered $100M+ in enterprise revenue.

cto.name: Maria Santos
cto.bio: Ex-Principal Engineer at leading cloud platforms. Architect of systems serving 100M+ users daily.

coo.name: Carlos Mendoza
coo.bio: Former McKinsey consultant specializing in digital transformation for Fortune 500 companies.
